SELECT account_id FROM web_match_player_info WHERE IF ( ( SELECT radiant_win FROM web_match_detail WHERE match_id = #{matchId} ) = 1, player_slot > 10 , player_slot < 10 ) AND match_id = #{matchId}

SELECT t5.account_id AS accountId, t5.rank AS count, t6.radiant_win AS isWin FROM ( SELECT t3.account_id, min( t3.rank ) AS rank FROM ( SELECT t1.account_id, t1.radiant_win, IFNULL( t2.radiant_win, 0 ) AS last_radiant_win, t1.radiant_win + IFNULL( t2.radiant_win, 0 ) AS cnt, t1.rank FROM ( SELECT account_id, radiant_win, rank FROM ( SELECT tt.account_id, tt.radiant_win, @rownum := @rownum + 1, IF ( @pdept = tt.account_id, @rank := @rank + 1, @rank := 1 ) AS rank, @pdept := tt.account_id FROM ( SELECT b.account_id, CASE
WHEN ( radiant_win = 0 AND player_slot < 10 ) OR ( radiant_win = 1 AND player_slot > 10 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS radiant_win, a.start_time FROM web_match_detail a LEFT JOIN web_match_player_info b ON a.match_id = b.match_id ORDER BY b.account_id, a.start_time DESC ) tt, ( SELECT @rownum := 0, @pdept := NULL, @rank := 0 ) a ) result ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT account_id, radiant_win, rank - 1 rank FROM ( SELECT tt.account_id, tt.radiant_win, @rownum := @rownum + 1, IF ( @pdept = tt.account_id, @rank := @rank + 1, @rank := 1 ) AS rank, @pdept := tt.account_id FROM ( SELECT b.account_id, CASE
WHEN ( radiant_win = 0 AND player_slot < 10 ) OR ( radiant_win = 1 AND player_slot > 10 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS radiant_win, a.start_time FROM web_match_detail a LEFT JOIN web_match_player_info b ON a.match_id = b.match_id ORDER BY b.account_id, a.start_time DESC ) tt, ( SELECT @rownum := 0, @pdept := NULL, @rank := 0 ) a ) result ) t2 ON t1.account_id = t2.account_id AND t1.rank = t2.rank ) t3 WHERE t3.cnt NOT IN ( 0, 2 ) GROUP BY t3.account_id UNION SELECT t4.account_id, 1 AS rank FROM ( SELECT b.account_id, count( b.account_id ) cn, sum( a.radiant_win ) AS su FROM web_match_detail a LEFT JOIN web_match_player_info b ON a.match_id = b.match_id GROUP BY b.account_id ) t4 WHERE cn = 1 OR su = 0 OR cn = su ) t5 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT account_id, radiant_win, rank FROM ( SELECT tt.account_id, tt.radiant_win, @rownum := @rownum + 1, IF ( @pdept = tt.account_id, @rank := @rank + 1, @rank := 1 ) AS rank, @pdept := tt.account_id FROM ( SELECT b.account_id, CASE
WHEN ( radiant_win = 0 AND player_slot < 10 ) OR ( radiant_win = 1 AND player_slot > 10 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS radiant_win, a.start_time FROM web_match_detail a LEFT JOIN web_match_player_info b ON a.match_id = b.match_id ORDER BY b.account_id, a.start_time DESC ) tt, ( SELECT @rownum := 0, @pdept := NULL, @rank := 0 ) a ) result ) t6 ON t5.account_id = t6.account_id AND t5.rank = t6.rank
